text_block_list.text:
Are you feeling alright, Kawakami? 
Did you eat something funny?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
N-Not at all! In fact, I'm trying to 
hold off on eating right now!
text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess

text_block_list.text:
I'm waiting for later because of the 
huge cake I made for your birth...day...
text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess

text_block_list.text:
Could you... forget I said anything? 
Otherwise my surprise is ruined!
text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess

text_block_list.text:
It's over! I had a clever plan to escort 
you over, like you always do. 
I can't believe I was so careless!
text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess

text_block_list.text:
A King doesn't fret over a mere 
one or two spoiled surprises.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
The fact that you went through that 
trouble to celebrate my birthday, 
is plenty surprising as is!
text_block_list.name: King Halo
